contexts.context: ...Uertices extremos circa quos … — … adeptos fuisse <mark>opinabantur</mark> uictoriam. ›Explicit liber astrolocorum.‹
...sphere cęli uoluitur... Explicit: … adeptos fuisse <mark>opinabantur</mark> uictoriam. Remarks: titles for the constellations images...
...uoluitur polos antiqui nuncupauerunt … — … adeptos fuisse <mark>opinabantur</mark> uictoriam. ›Explicit liber astrologorum.‹ On ff....
